line_1: Here flowers in sweet confusion strown,
line_2: O'er the verdant mead are blown;

line_1: See there, untouch'd your tulips strown,
line_2: For I devour'd the roots alone!

line_1: So sweetly wild his woods are strown,
line_2: Nature mistakes them for her own,

line_1: With thorns her couch of death is strewn,
line_2: Denied a parent's care, unpitied, and alone.

line_1: Illustrious meed, too oft profusely strewn
line_2: To deck the precincts of Ambition's throne,
